text:
Kyle McCulloch (born November 11, 1962) is a Canadian television writer, producer and voice actor. He is best known for writing for the cartoon shows "South Park" and "SpongeBob SquarePants". He also created and voiced the title character of the web series "Mr. Wong" (2000–2001).
McCulloch is from Winnipeg, Manitoba. He now lives in Los Angeles, California, United States.
